name: Lufthansa CityLine CRJ-701ER [D-ACPK] *Full Flight* RZE-FRA ᴴᴰ
description:
Here is the first leg of my trip home, on a Lufthansa CityLine CRJ-700, registration D-ACPK. I actually flew on this aircraft 3 years ago! So anyway, enjoy this full flight video of Lufthansa CityLine Flight 1387 from Rzeszow-Jasionka International Airport to Frankfurt-Main.

Thanks for watching! Please comment, rate, and subscribe!
____________________________________________________

FLIGHT INFO
Airline: Lufthansa Cityline (CLH/CL)
Aircraft: Bombardier CRJ-701ER
Aircraft Name: "Besigheim"
Livery: Standard
Engines: 2x GE CF34-8C1
Registration: D-ACPK
Route: RZE-FRA
Callsign: Hansaline 1387
Runway used: 27 (RZE), 25R (FRA)
Taxiway(s) used: A, backtrack RWY 9/27 (RZE), P16, P, N11, N (FRA)
FlightAware: http://flightaware.com/live/flight/DACPK
____________________________________________________

VIDEO LOG:
00:12 - Bulgarian Air Charter MD-82 departing RZE
00:28 - Taxi and announcements begin
01:45 - Taxiing onto runway 09/27, beginning backtrack
04:00 - Turning around at the end of runway 27
04:52 - Spool Up
05:28 - Rotate!
06:55 - Flaps and Slats retracted
07:05 - In flight
07:20 - On Approach to Runway 25R at FRA
09:35 - Condensation on the wings
09:57 - Breaking through the clouds
10:25 - Short Final
10:35 - Touchdown
11:11 - Taxiing off the runway
____________________________________________________
